item.description:
Meet at Peabody City Hall at 12 noon to start. Carol will meet us there(1-978-531-0317)(gorevitz8@verizon.net). This is the 26th year for this festival which includes international foods, music, dancing, and crafts. This is a smaller version of the Lowell Folk Festival.

For more information try boston central.com/events/fair.

If any one wants to carpool from NH we could meet at the park and ride behind Wendy's Restaurant in Londonderry at exit 4 or somewhere else on the way. Let me know by calling 603-432-4271, 603-505-6172 or email me at nkimen1@myfairpoint.net.

Rain date is October 4th.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Peabody(MA) International Festival
